name: Prototype Aminus

refinement_effect.refine_one: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 240% ATK DMG to enemies within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 300% ATK DMG to enemies within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 360% ATK DMG to enemies within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 420% ATK DMG to enemies within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 480% ATK DMG to enemies within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

description: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.
